ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Helianthus Annuss Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Sorbitan Stearate, Polysorbate 60, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Coco-Glucoside, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sodium Lactate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Chondroitin Sulfate, Atelocollagen, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Acrylates/C10-C30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, BHT, Sodium Hydroxide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexlglycerin.
